title: SSH port
extract: SSH is typically used to log into a remote machine and execute commands, but it also supports tunneling, forwarding TCP ports and X11 connections; it can transfer files using the associated SSH file transfer (SFTP) or secure copy (SCP) protocols. ... The standard TCP port 22 has been assigned for contacting SSH servers.
extract_html: SSH is typically used to log into a remote machine and execute commands, but it also supports tunneling, forwarding TCP ports and X11 connections; it can transfer files using the associated SSH file transfer (SFTP) or secure copy (SCP) protocols. ... The standard TCP port 22 has been assigned for contacting SSH servers.
